review: This binder was purchased for my 12 year old son who is extremely hard on binders, folders, backpacks, etc.  This binder made it halfway through the school year before it needed to be replaced. While that may not sound long to many people, it actually wasn't bad for him as some have fallen apart within a month.  Overall, this is a decent binder, but did give 4 stars because the rings inside seemed to be the first thing to go and could have been a little sturdier to begin with. I would recommend this product.
productTitle: Avery Heavy-Duty Binder with 2-Inch One Touch EZD Ring, Blue (79882)
